entry.title: The Immigration (Isle of Man) Order 2008
entry.summary: This Order extends certain provisions of United Kingdom immigration and related legislation to the Isle of Man, with modifications as necessary. In particular, this Order extends provision contained in the following statutes—

entry.title: The Social Security (Industrial Injuries) (Dependency) (Permitted Earnings Limits) Order 2008
entry.summary: Where a disablement pension with unemployability supplement is increased in respect of one or more children or qualifying young persons and the beneficiary is one of two persons who are spouses or civil partners residing together or who are living together as husband and wife or civil partners, paragraph 4(4) of Schedule 7 to the Social Security Contributions and Benefits Act 1992 provides that the increase shall not be payable in respect of the first child or qualifying young person if the other person’s earnings are £180 a week or more and in respect of further children or qualifying young persons for each complete £24 by which the earnings exceed £180. This Order increases the amounts of £180 and £24 to £185 and £25 respectively.

entry.title: The S4C (Investment Activities) Approval Order 2008
entry.summary: This Order approves the carrying out by the Welsh Authority of the activities listed in Article 3, being activities which, under section 206(1) of the Communications Act 2003, appear to the Welsh Authority to be activities that it is appropriate for them to carry on in association with the carrying out of their function of providing the S4C and S4C Digital services, and which are connected, other than merely in financial terms, with activities undertaken by them for the carrying out of that function.

entry.title: The Greater London Authority (Limitation of Salaries) (Amendment) Order 2008
entry.summary: This Order amends the Greater London Authority (Limitation of Salaries) Order 2000 (“the 2000 Order”).

entry.title: The Local Authorities (Functions and Responsibilities) (England) (Amendment No. 2) Regulations 2008
entry.summary: These Regulations amend the Local Authorities (Functions and Responsibilities) (England) Regulations 2000 (“the 2000 Regulations”). They apply in relation to local authorities in England.

entry.title: The Financial Services and Markets Act 2000 (Exemption) (Amendment) Order 2008
entry.summary: This Order amends the Schedule to the Financial Services and Markets Act 2000 (Exemption) Order 2001 (S.I. 2001/1201) (“the principal order”) which provides for certain persons to be exempt from the general prohibition imposed by section 19 of the Financial Services and Markets Act 2000 (c.8) (“the Act”) on carrying on a regulated activity in the United Kingdom unless authorised under the Act.

entry.title: The Motor Vehicle Testing (Amendment) Regulations (Northern Ireland) 2008
entry.summary: These Regulations amend the Motor Vehicle Testing Regulations (Northern Ireland) 2003 (the 2003 Regulations).

entry.title: The Social Security Benefits Up-rating Regulations (Northern Ireland) 2008
entry.summary: These Regulations contain only provisions in consequence of an order under sections 132 and 132A of the Social Security Administration (Northern Ireland) Act 1992 and accordingly, by virtue of section 149(3) of, and paragraph 3 of Schedule 5 to, that Act, are not subject to the requirement of section 149(2) of that Act for prior reference to the Social Security Advisory Committee.

title.div: The Hywel Dda National Health Service Trust (Establishment) Order 2008 / Gorchymyn Ymddiriedolaeth Gwasanaeth Iechyd Gwladol Hywel Dda (Sefydlu) 2008

div.p: This Order establishes the Hywel Dda National Health Service Trust, an NHS trust provided for in section 18 of the National Health Service (Wales) Act 2006. It also provides for the functions of the trust (article 3) and the number of executive and non-executive directors (article 4). It specifies the operational date and accounting date of the trust (article 5).

Mae'r Gorchymyn hwn yn sefydlu Ymddiriedolaeth Gwasanaeth Iechyd Gwladol Hywel Dda, ymddiriedolaeth GIG y darperir ar ei chyfer yn adran 18 o Ddeddf y Gwasanaeth Iechyd Gwladol (Cymru) 2006. Mae hefyd yn darparu ar gyfer swyddogaethau'r ymddiriedolaeth yn erthygl 3. Mae'n pennu dyddiad gweithredol a dyddiad cyfrifyddu yr ymddiriedolaeth yn erthygl 5.

title.div: The Abertawe Bro Morgannwg University National Health Service Trust (Establishment) Order 2008 / Gorchymyn Ymddiriedolaeth Brifysgol Gwasanaeth Iechyd Gwladol Abertawe Bro Morgannwg (Sefydlu) 2008

div.p: This Order establishes the Abertawe Bro Morgannwg National Health Service Trust, an NHS trust provided for in section 18 of the National Health Service (Wales) Act 2006. It also provides for the functions of the trust (article 3) and the number of executive and non-executive directors (article 4). It specifies the operational date and accounting date of the trust (article 5).

Mae'r Gorchymyn hwn yn sefydlu Ymddiriedolaeth Brifysgol Gwasanaeth Iechyd Gwladol Abertawe Bro Morgannwg, ymddiriedolaeth GIG y darperir ar ei chyfer yn adran 18 o Ddeddf y Gwasanaeth Iechyd Gwladol (Cymru) 2006. Mae hefyd yn darparu ar gyfer swyddogaethau'r ymddiriedolaeth (erthygl 3) a nifer y cyfarwyddwyr gweithredol ac anweithredol (erthygl 4). Mae'n pennu dyddiad gweithredol a dyddiad cyfrifyddu yr ymddiriedolaeth (erthygl 5).

title.div: The Meat Products (Wales) (Amendment) Regulations 2008 / Rheoliadau Cynhyrchion Cig (Cymru) (Diwygio) 2008

div.p: These Regulations amend the Meat Products (Wales) Regulations 2004 (S.I. 2004/1396 (W.141).
Mae'r Rheoliadau hyn yn diwygio Rheoliadau Cynhyrchion Cig (Cymru) 2004 (O.S. 2004/1396 (Cy.141).

entry.title: The Companies (Reduction of Capital) (Creditor Protection) Regulations 2008
entry.summary: These Regulations implement the amendment made to Article 32(1) of Council Directive 77/91/EEC (OJ L 26, 31.1.1977, p. 1) by Directive 2006/68/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council (OJ L 264, 25.9.2006, p. 32). The latter Directive amended the former as regards the formation of public companies and the maintenance and alteration of their capital. The Regulations also make corresponding amendments to the law as it relates to private companies.

title.div: The Cwm Taf National Health Service Trust (Establishment) Order 2008 / Gorchymyn Ymddiriedolaeth Gwasanaeth Iechyd Gwladol Cwm Taf (Sefydlu) 2008

div.p: This Order establishes the Cwm Taf National Health Service Trust, an NHS trust provided for in section 18 of the National Health Service (Wales) Act 2006. It also provides for the functions of the trust in article 3. It specifies the operational date and accounting date of the trust in article 5.

Mae'r Gorchymyn hwn yn sefydlu Ymddiriedolaeth Gwasanaeth Iechyd Gwladol Cwm Taf, ymddiriedolaeth GIG y darperir ar ei chyfer yn adran 18 o Ddeddf y Gwasanaeth Iechyd Gwladol (Cymru) 2006. Mae hefyd yn darparu ar gyfer swyddogaethau'r ymddiriedolaeth yn erthygl 3. Mae'n pennu dyddiad gweithredol a dyddiad cyfrifyddu yr ymddiriedolaeth yn erthygl 5.

entry.title: The Social Security (Miscellaneous Amendments) Regulations 2008
entry.summary: These Regulations amend a number of different regulations relating to social security.

entry.title: The Housing Benefit (Local Housing Allowance) (Amendment) Regulations (Northern Ireland) 2008
entry.summary: These Regulations amend the Housing Benefit Regulations (Northern Ireland) 2006 in connection with the introduction of local housing allowance.

entry.title: The Housing Benefit (State Pension Credit) (Local Housing Allowance) (Amendment) Regulations (Northern Ireland) 2008
entry.summary: These Regulations amend the Housing Benefit (Persons who have attained the qualifying age for state pension credit) Regulations (Northern Ireland) 2006 in connection with the introduction of local housing allowance.

entry.title: The Housing Benefit (Local Housing Allowance) (Miscellaneous and Consequential Amendments) Regulations (Northern Ireland) 2008
entry.summary: These Regulations amend various sets of Regulations in connection with the introduction of local housing allowance arrangements in housing benefit from 7th April 2008.

entry.title: The National Health Service Pension Scheme (Additional Voluntary Contributions) and National Health Service (Injury Benefits and Compensation for Premature Retirement) Amendment Regulations 2008

ukm:Subject.Value: NATIONAL HEALTH SERVICE, ENGLAND AND WALES

category.term: NATIONAL HEALTH SERVICE, ENGLAND AND WALES

entry.summary: These Regulations further amend the National Health Service Pension Scheme (Additional Voluntary Contributions) Regulations 2000 (S.I. 2000/619) (“the AVC Regulations”), the National Health Service (Injury Benefits) Regulations 1995 (S.I.1995/866) (“the Injury Benefits Regulations”) and the National Health Service (Compensation for Premature Retirement) Regulations 2002 (S.I. 2002/1311) (“the Compensation Regulations”).

entry.title: The Pensions (2005 Order) (Commencement No. 11) Order (Northern Ireland) 2008
entry.summary: This Order provides for the coming into operation of Article 250 of the Pensions (Northern Ireland) Order 2005—

entry.title: The Housing Benefit (Executive Determinations) Regulations (Northern Ireland) 2008
entry.summary: These Regulations relate to the introduction of local housing allowance arrangements in housing benefit.
